content.question: Respond to all parts of the question. In your response, use substantive examples where appropriate. Based on the information, please respond to the following questions. Identify a difference in the facts of Baker v. Carr (1962) and Wesberry v. Sanders (1964) that affected the impact of the Supreme Court’s decision. Explain how the decision in Baker v. Carr is similar to the decision in Wesberry v. Sanders. Explain the role stare decisis likely played in the Wesberry v. Sanders decision.

skill.text: Skill 1.E: Explain how political principles, institutions, processes, policies, and behaviors apply to different scenarios in context.
